snippet.title: Nintendo DS Longplay [067] Mario Hoops 3 on 3
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

What would you get if you fuse Mario and Final Fantasy? Well... a game of basketball, what else? I don't know if anyone though of that before this game came out, but whatever. It's a fun little game. There are two tournament modes (normal and hard), a dribble bonus game and a exhibition mode where you can customize a single match. Also a Matchup for two players. The pro mode for your opponents you get at the end of the hard tournament mode is only for those single matches, not a separate tournament mode. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
